participant_1.background:
I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
i noticed i m very talented for this sport.
I enjoy racing go karts and driving my classic car.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality.
I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices.
I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
i like cartoons.
i don t eat meat.

content.text: I'm going to go to UC Santa Cruz, it's a pretty good school. Do you know where you're going to college yet?
I'm not sure yet, I'm still looking at a few schools. I'm kind of into art and design, so I'm looking for a school that has a good program in that.
What kind of art do you like?
I like a lot of different types of art, but I'm especially into cartoons and animation. I've been thinking about starting my own YouTube channel to show off my work.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you'd be really good at it.
Thanks! I'm excited to see where it goes.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to go out for walks, I love to read, and I like to watch movies.
Me too! I love to read, and I love to watch movies. I'm not a big fan of going for walks, but I do like to go hiking sometimes.
Hiking is really fun! I love being outdoors.
Me too! I think it's really important to get some fresh air every day.
I agree! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
